title: Mrs. Harry Harper's Awakening
description: Five stories with the general themes of foreign missions, money, and hypocrisy. Mrs. Harry Harper's Awakening: A young wife in a new city is drawn into a mysterious ladies' society with the initials, W. P. B. F. M. The Harrisville Young Ladies' Band: A small, struggling girls' missions group gets a new vision for their meetings. Mrs. Dunlap's Commentary: Profession and actions collide in the life of a Christian housewife and Sunday school teacher, influencing those around her. Pictures from Mrs. Pierson's Life: Another story in which a family's priorities and example lead to their natural conclusion. --Summary by TriciaG
